channel.title: Natural-Language-Processing on Nemo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Natural-Language-Processing on Nemo's Blog

item.title: Natural Language Processing: Part B. Modern Approaches
item.description: This is the second part of the Natural Language Processing Series. It covers modern approaches in natural language processing, including RNNs, VAE-LMs, Transformer, BERT, GPT, GAN-LMs, In-Context Learning, CoT, RLHF, DPO, etc.

item.title: Natural Language Processing: Part A. Classical Methods
item.description: This is the first part of the Natural Language Processing Series. It covers classical methods in natural language processing, including CFG, LSA, HMM, N-gram, Word2Vec, etc.
